participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a pragmatic and grounded individual, with a strong connection to nature through his work as a bee farmer. He has a unique perspective on life, valuing simplicity and the beauty of the natural world.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i am a bee farmer.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is a passionate and determined artist, driven by her dreams despite the challenges she faces. She possesses a vibrant spirit and a deep love for music that fuels her ambition.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

content.text: i am not a very good person . i work as a farmer
